last_episode_to_air.name: Borges
last_episode_to_air.overview: Pablo becomes a personal assistant to a YouTube star. A mysterious character reappears and reveals unimaginable secrets, again threatening the future of the four.

name: Borges
overview: Four employees of an import company discover that they were cheated by their former boss with a proposed society. Now with the bankrupt company, it is up to this quartet to solve all the processes and debts of the company. With no money to clear all accounts, they decide to create a video channel for the internet.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: With the bankrupt company, it is up to this quartet to solve all the processes and debts of the company. With no money to clear all accounts, they decide to create a video channel for the internet.

episodes.name: Viral
episodes.overview: In an attempt to explain the blow they took, four employees of a bankrupt importer with a lot of problems make a video that ends up becoming a hilarious viral video. This ends up changing the direction of the company and their lives.

episodes.name: Religion
episodes.overview: Borges Importadora's new video seemed harmless, but it ended up offending a strange and unknown religion. Now they need to please the Shaman to get rid of a lawsuit, in addition to solving another bizarre problem with an Uber driver.

episodes.name: Tapicrepe
episodes.overview: Erasmo wants to change his look and with that he needs to change his life. Sonia, on the other hand, tries to end the life of the cafeteria where she was poorly served. In the end, the sacrifice and sad death of the most charismatic character in the group.

episodes.name: Periodic Exam
episodes.overview: Every Borges' employee has their secrets. They just didn't have the gossip doctor who came to do periodic exams at the company and who doesn't keep other people's secrets so well.

episodes.name: Borges, meanwhile....
episodes.overview: A troublemaker and politically correct actor commands and desires in the recordings. Meanwhile, a humble street vendor subleases a small room to make brigadeiros, transforming Borges into a den of child labour and other crimes.

episodes.name: Gay, a Mugger or a Fan?
episodes.overview: While Sonia uses Borges' new video to send hints to her boyfriend, Pablo tries to find out if a guy who stares at him in a cafeteria is gay, mugger or fan.

episodes.name: Anime Conference
episodes.overview: The partners are invited to an anime fair. What looked bad gets worse when they discover they are the targets of a conspiracy planned by the event organizers.

episodes.name: The Inspector
episodes.overview: Amid the production of a practically pornographic skit, a City Hall inspector appears. Now they have to screw the guy up, pretend they are still an importer, and also, direct the worst actor in the world.

episodes.name: European Channel
episodes.overview: The four discover that a European channel is plagiarizing their videos and, unlike them, making a huge success. Now the partners will try to reverse the situation.

episodes.name: Borges
episodes.overview: Pablo becomes a personal assistant to a YouTube star. A mysterious character reappears and reveals unimaginable secrets, again threatening the future of the four.
